original_text: And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
korean_text: 갓 지파 중에서 준 것은 살인자의 도피성 길르앗 라못과 그 목초지이요 또 마하나임과 그 목초지와

sentences.original_text: And out of the tribe of Gad
Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs
sentences.korean_translation: 글ilead에 있는 라못과 그 주변 마을들

sentences.original_text: to be a city of refuge for the slayer
